S4.SS1.8.8.8.caption: Experimental results on the De En and En De IIMT tasks. Ablation study of Translatotron-V on the De En IIMT task. S-BLEU represents Structure-BLEU. Translation examples of different models on the De En IIMT task. BLEU scores on different groups divided according to WER. We compute the WER using the text produced by the OCR toolkit. Experimental results on the Fr En and Ro En IIMT tasks. BLEU scores with different loss function coefficients. Several examples of our synthetic data using IWSLT14 De-En. Comparison of our IIMT data with other IIMT data used in previous work  . Comparison of Structure-BLEU and BLEU. The bounding box of the text is drawn with red lines.
